Test.name: Create / Kill Agent
Test.WhatTest: Tests creating and killing agents by requesting the AMS to perform the CreateAgent and KillAgent actions of the JADEManagementOntology.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if all the above operations have the expected effect and no exception is thrown.

Test.name: Install / Uninstall MTP
Test.WhatTest: Tests installing and un-installing MTPs by requesting the AMS to perform the InstallMTP and UninstallMTP actions of the JADEManagementOntology.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if all the above operations have the expected effect and no exception is thrown.
